title: Blended Course for Portfolio-Based Mathematics Competency Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics concepts and basic job-related problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Portfolio-based assessment and integration of mathematical competencies applicable in medical, legal, and technical professional fields.

learning_goals: Learners systematically document mathematical problem-solving processes in portfolios and identify at least three core competencies
Learners reflect at least twice on their mathematical competency development through peer feedback and self-assessment in blended learning environments
Learners solve over 80% of work-related mathematical problems through analysis of practical cases included in portfolios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
